title: Easy Korean for Beginners - Conversations
headline: Upgrade your language skills and learn to speak Korean like a native with this free online course.
description: An-nyong-ha-se-yo! Korean language skills are in high demand as K-Pop culture has taken over the world. Following the 'Easy Korean for Beginners' course, we will now hone your conversation skills and take your language proficiency to the next level. Begin with learning vocabulary and grammar structures and continue to expand your knowledge with useful expressions and correct pronunciation that will soon have you speaking Korean like a native.
courseDescription:
How do you introduce yourself in Korean? What phrases can you use to greet friends and family? How do you pronounce the words to sound like a local? The best way to learn a language is through conversations and this Korean language course is designed to give you that experience. Your instructor, Uni, is a Korean native who will teach you all the basic sentences and expressions you need to know to begin speaking the language. 

We begin with a basic introduction where you will learn how to communicate your name and background to greet your colleagues. We revise the basic expressions you need and teach you how to use them in a sentence. We will then introduce you to the Korean nouns, vocabulary and words used most often in daily life. Throughout the course, Uni will guide you with the correct pronunciation of each word to help you sound like a native with no foreign accent.

This Korean course is for beginners. We have planned all the topics so you effortlessly understand the language. The flow of the topics is sequenced to build on each other. You will find the new vocabulary and grammar easy to remember and enjoyable to learn. So if you are interested in expanding your language skills, why wait? Join this course and learn to speak Korean today!
